analysis.description:
MITToken (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#34-225) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#110-114)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol:
	Contract MITToken has payable functions:
	 - _lockToken (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#196-210)
	 - _unlockToken (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#210-220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
MITToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#38)
MITToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#110-114) should be declared external
MITToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#121-130) should be declared external
MITToken.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#153-166) should be declared external
MITToken.burn (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#169-180) should be declared external
MITToken.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#184-196) should be declared external
MITToken._lockToken (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#196-210) should be declared external
MITToken._unlockToken (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#210-220) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/6/0xc08dcf2fa37b87a89ac7f0fdcb4aebda378dea29.sol#1): it allows old versions
